task.title: Setting Your Repository as a Working Copy in the View

step.cmd: In the view in , click Browse File System next to the Working Copy drop-down.
In the Choose window, navigate to the clone of the repository that you created as part of and click Choose.
In the Connection dialog asking whether to accept and store the SSH key associated with your account, click Yes.
In the Connection dialog asking whether to create a file with a list of known hosts, click Yes.
In the SSH Passphrase dialog, enter the SSH passphrase you set up as part of TBD and click OK.
